title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Philosophy of Modern Art" by Herbert Read", 1955
medium: Lithograph in grey, black, white and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in black ink at lower right in script: lustig 
Across the top in black, white and yellow ink: The/ philosophy/ of (black)/ MODERN ART [yellow and white]/ HERBERT READ [black]
Across the bottom in black and white ink: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press [black]/ M7 $1.35
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a grey background. The title author and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name, synopsis and review of the book. 'Modern Art' is written in alternating yellow and white letters. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Philosophy of Modern Art" by Herbert Read", 1955.
1955. Lithograph in grey, black, white and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-178.
